title: Health, Wellbeing, Competence and Aging (Annals of Traditional Chinese Medicine, Vol. 6)
cleaned_text: No hay productos en el carrito Health, Wellbeing, Competence and Aging (Annals of Traditional Chinese Vol. 6) Leung, P.-C. — Woo, J. — Kofler, W. 1ª Edición Noviembre 2013 Inglés Tapa dura 248 pags 500 gr 17 x 24 x 2 cm ISBN 9789814425667 Editorial WORLD SCIENTIFIC LIBRO IMPRESO 45,49 €43,22 €IVA incluido Recíbelo en un plazo De 2 a 3 semanas Description The fear of death may translate into the desire for longevity. However, longevity is a true blessing only if it is coupled with good health. Healthiness, in today's expectation, is not simply a disease free state. Rather, it is very much a state of wellbeing and competence, both physically and socially. While Oriental medicine emphasizes on the promotion of physiological balance and internal balance as an collates all the different views and approaches from Austria, Russia, China and Japan in the exploration of Health, Wellbeing, Competence and Aging.
